tool_description: Real-time flight data from aircraft all over the world.
name: Live Flight Data
title: Live Flight Data

api_list.name: Squawk (up to 5 squawk codes)
api_list.description:
Use up to 5 squawk codes. Comma seperated.

e.g 1000,1255,…

api_list.name: Registration (up to 50 registrations)
api_list.description:
Use up to 50 registration. Comma seperated.

e.g PH-HZI,G-STBP,…

api_list.name: Callsign (up to 50 callsigns)
api_list.description:
Use up to 50 callsigns. Comma seperated.

e.g CAI7P,AFR58AB,…

api_list.name: Type (up to 5 aircraft types)
api_list.description:
Use up to 5 aircraft types. Comma seperated.

e.g b738,A388,…

api_list.name: Between specified altitudes
api_list.description: Show all aircraft that are between specified altitudes. (in feet)

api_list.name: Above specified altitude
api_list.description: Show all aircraft that are on or above specified altitude. (in feet)

api_list.name: Below specified altitude
api_list.description: Show all aircraft that are on or below specified altitude. (in feet)

api_list.name: Range (up to 350 NM)
api_list.description: Show all aircraft within specified distance up to 350 NM.

api_list.name: Icao (up to 50 icao codes)
api_list.description:
Use up to 50 icao codes. Comma seperated.

e.g 461E16,4BB573,...
